title: As Wipro gets a new CEO, a look at its woes in four data charts
description: The change of guard at Wipro is coming at a time when the IT major's operating margins are the lowest among its peers. And the change comes at a time when clients are in no mood to ramp up big budget transformation deals.
content: Srinivas Pallia who replaced Thierry Delaporte over the weekend has an unenviable task to regain revenue momentum, which has hit a low relative to peers without any room to tweak operating margin which is also lowest among top peers. And, this at a time when clients are in no mood to ramp up big budget transformation deals.
